ingredients: 8 chicken thigh fillets (skin on or off — your choice), cut into strips about half an inch wide and two inches long)
about 2 c. of vegetable cooking oil
about 3/4 c. of tapioca or corn starch
1 bird’s eye chili, finely chopped (or use chili sauce or flakes)
a drizzle of sesame seed oil
about 2 tbsps. of toasted sesame seeds
